name: Agoura Hills
shortDescription: A scenic gateway to the Santa Monica Mountains offering outdoor adventures, equestrian culture, and family-friendly neighborhoods.
fullDescription: Nestled in the Conejo Valley, Agoura Hills blends natural beauty with suburban comfort. Known for its rolling hills, hiking trails through the Santa Monica Mountains, and equestrian-friendly communities, this city offers a peaceful retreat with easy freeway access. Home to renowned entertainment tech companies and top-rated schools, Agoura Hills attracts families and professionals seeking a balanced lifestyle between nature and urban conveniences.
heroImageAlt: Rolling hills and a scenic view near Agoura Hills

neighborhoods.name: Calabasas
neighborhoods.description: Affluent neighbor with luxury estates, celebrity homes, and the Commons shopping center.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Luxury homes and shopping in Calabasas

neighborhoods.name: Westlake Village
neighborhoods.description: Upscale community featuring a scenic lake, golf courses, and corporate campuses.

neighborhoods.name: Malibu
neighborhoods.description: Iconic coastal city with celebrity beaches, surfing spots, and oceanfront dining.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Malibu beach coastline with ocean view

neighborhoods.name: Thousand Oaks
neighborhoods.description: Family-oriented community with parks, shopping centers, and California Lutheran University.

highlights.title: Santa Monica Mountains
highlights.description: Protected wilderness area offering hiking, mountain biking, and horseback riding trails.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Trail with mountains and wildflowers in the Santa Monica Mountains

highlights.title: Paramount Ranch
highlights.description: Historic film set turned national park with Western town and event space.

highlights.title: Reyes Adobe
highlights.description: Restored 19th-century adobe home serving as cultural center and museum.

highlights.title: Equestrian Culture
highlights.description: Horse-friendly community with riding trails, boarding facilities, and annual events.

faqs.question: What is Agoura Hills known for?
faqs.answer: Gateway to the Santa Monica Mountains, equestrian lifestyle, and as a filming location for movies/TV shows.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Agoura Hills?
faqs.answer: Top-rated Las Virgenes Unified School District serves the community, including top-ranked Agoura High School.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities are available?
faqs.answer: Hiking at Cheeseboro Canyon, mountain biking, horseback riding, and rock climbing in the Santa Monicas.

faqs.question: How is the commute to Los Angeles?
faqs.answer: Easy access via 101 Freeway, with commute times averaging 45-60 minutes to downtown LA.

mainEntity.name: What is Agoura Hills known for?

acceptedAnswer.text: Agoura Hills is renowned as the gateway to the Santa Monica Mountains, its equestrian culture, and as a filming location for movies and TV shows.

mainEntity.name: How are the schools in Agoura Hills?

acceptedAnswer.text: The city is served by the highly-rated Las Virgenes Unified School District, including top-ranked Agoura High School.
Residents enjoy hiking, mountain biking, horseback riding, and rock climbing in the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area.

mainEntity.name: How is the commute to Los Angeles?

acceptedAnswer.text: The 101 Freeway provides direct access to Los Angeles, with commute times averaging 45-60 minutes to downtown.
